actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the Van Buren-Lindewald Historic Site at Kinderhook, New York.

summary.text: Establishes the Van Buren-Lindenwald Historic Site at Kinderhook, New York, the former residence of Martin Van Buren, eighth President of the United States. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Van Buren-Lindewald Historic Site at Kinderhook, New York.
